picard.analysis
Interface CollectMultipleMetrics.ProgramInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectMultipleMetrics.Program
Enclosing class:
CollectMultipleMetrics
public static interface CollectMultipleMetrics.ProgramInterface

This interface allows developers to create Programs to run in addition to the ones defined in the Program enum. Includes a method for determining whether or not a Program explicitly needs a reference sequence (i.e. cannot be null)

Method Summary
